name: Pennsylvania Trust Company v. Koller (et ux., Appellant)

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Pennsylvania Trust Company v. Koller (et ux., Appellant).

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
All questions raised in this appeal were correctly disposed of by the learned president judge of the court below, whose opinion is herewith adopted by us in affirming his order discharging the rule to open judgment.
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Lee Plummer, for appellee, submitted no brief.
casebody.head_matter:
Pennsylvania Trust Company v. Koller (et ux., Appellant).
Argued April 17, 1935.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
May 13, 1935:
Robert W. Smith, for appellant.
J. Lee Plummer, for appellee, submitted no brief.
